item.title: [PI] Adding ::court ( Interview staff apps ) [SNIPPET]
item.dc:creator: @WHATBLOOD WHATBLOOD
item.description:
@WHATBLOOD wrote:

[center]Staff interview SNIPPET[/center]

Difficulty 1:10

Open your commands.java

if(playerCommand.startsWith("court") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("danny"))) {//court try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = 1969; c2.teleportToY = 5002; c2.Jail = true; c2.sendMessage("Your beening Staff Reviewed by "+c.playerName+" & Jake , Answer wisely!"); c.sendMessage("Successfully Interviewing "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

if(playerCommand.startsWith("view") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("danny"))) { c.teleportToX = 1971; c.teleportToY = 5002; }

[code]
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“leave”)) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.teleportToX = 2537;
c2.teleportToY = 9812;
c2.monkeyk0ed = 0;
c2.Jail = false;
c2.sendMessage(“You have been Let free by “+c.playerName+”, Youll be told if your succesful.”);
c.sendMessage(“Successfully unjailed “+c2.playerName+”.”);
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}

}[/code]

Add this , Remember to change the name’s of the people who are allowed to use this command.

Snippet Done.

Read full topic
